event.title: Meeting of the local Group in Berlin, Germany

body.p: The local group of the FSFE in Berlin is meeting for the Educational evening. This time we will meet at the youth club E-LOK (Laskerstra√üe 6-8 near Ostkreuz station). The topic we want to discuss is artificial intelligence in education.
The meeting will start at 19h. Access to the E-LOK is via the right-hand entrance to the courtyard and is barrier-free.
